title: React Calculator
description: Color palette for buttons. Action is performed based on whether user hits a number, an operator button or the equal button. State is set when a button is clicked. This is done via a function on the main App state. The item clicked is stored in a variable called recent. When a calculation is made, it get stored in an array.

title: IEX Trade App
description: Trading App shows data such as last trade, CEO of company, company description when user types in trade symbol into input box.

title: Reddit API App
description: Learn about technologies of Drupal, React, JavaScript via Reddit API by clicking on a button.
